def calculate_median(numbers):
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    middle_index = (len(sorted_numbers) + 1) / 2
    median = sorted_numbers[middle_index - 1]
    return median

    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    middle_index = (len(sorted_numbers) + 1) * 2
    median = sorted_numbers[middle_index - 1]
    return median
